virtualkey.name: Virtual key
virtualkey.description: Presses a virtual key from CCU/Homegear or simulate keypress.

address.name: Address
address.description: Address of homematic device or BidCoS-RF for virtual remote.

param.name: Param
param.description: Event to send i.e. PRESS_LONG, PRESS_SHORT.

set_variable_value.name: Set variable value
set_variable_value.description: Sets the name of a node.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name(s) of homematic central to set value.

name.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::name%]
name.description: Name of the variable to set.

set_device_value.name: Set device value
set_device_value.description: Sets a device property on RPC XML interface.

set_install_mode.name: Set install mode
set_install_mode.description: Set a RPC XML interface into installation mode.

interface.name: Interface
interface.description: Select the given interface into install mode.

mode.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::mode%]
mode.description: 1= Normal mode / 2= Remove exists old links.

time.name: Time
time.description: Time to run in install mode.

address.name: Address
address.description: Address of homematic device or BidCoS-RF to learn.

put_paramset.name: Put paramset
put_paramset.description: Calls to putParamset in the RPC XML interface.

interface.name: Interface
interface.description: The interfaces name from the config.
